summary: CONSUMER RECEIVED RECALL 02V237000.  THEIR IS NO DEALER AVAILABLE FOR REMEDY WITHIN 100 MILES.  MANUFACTURER FIRST ADVISED CONSUMER NOT TO DRIVE COACH OVER 100 MILES OR THEY WOULD NOT BE LIABLE FOR ANY DAMAGES.  WHEN THE CONSUMER ADVISED THAT CLOSET DEALER WAS OVER 100 MILES AWAY, THE MANUFACTURER ADVISED HER TO DRIVE CAREFULLY OR GO TO A DEALER OVER 200 MILES AWAY.  THE MANUFACTURER WILL NOT ASSIST WITH ANY ALTERNATIVE TO REMEDY.   *NLM
